rules_text:
Foreshadow {7}{B}{B} [i](You may cast this spell for its foreshadow cost. If you do, also trigger its “dies” ability when it enters.)[/i]
When Wurgelurg dies, each opponent discards three cards, sacrifices three creatures, and loses 3 life. You draw three cards, create three tapped 2/2 black Zombie creature tokens, and gain 3 life.
